data: “Do you reckon it’ll seem the same?” Talitha, quite breathless with the long climb, stood looking down at her brother, who was following more slowly up the scraggy slope of Red Mountain.
“DO you reckon it’ll seem the same?”  Talitha, quite breathless with the long climb, stood looking down at her brother, who was following more slowly up the scraggy slope of Red Mountain.
“DO you reckon it’ll seem the same?” Talitha, quite breathless with the long climb, stood looking down at her brother, who was following more slowly up the scraggy slope of Red Mountain.
Goose Creek Folks: A Story of the Kentucky Mountains
Bush, Isabel Graham, 1863-1913; Bush, Florence Lilian, 1865-1972
